986810.name: Pretty Kitty Fuzzy
986810.description:
Pretty Kitty Fuzzy is a fast paced "bullet-hell" shoot-em-up! Travel through nine imaginative stages and defeat the evil snake witch Anguis. With nostalgic graphics and an awesome soundtrack this game is the prettiest experience around!

STORY CAMPAIGN

Join Fuzzy on her adventure to defeat the evil snake witch Anguis through 9 intense stages with multiple endings!

HI-POINT HERO!

A score attack mode where you try to get the highest score you can in one shot. Think you have what it takes to be the Hi-Point Hero?

MEANIE MAYHEM

Meanie Mayhem is a Boss Rush mode for PKF! Revisit all of the boss fights you've encountered and get a high score. Try the many difficulties for the extra points!

LEADERBOARDS, EXTRAS AND MORE!

There are leaderboards to keep track of your high scores, unlockable skins, difficulties and endings to keep even the most hardcore players busy!
986810.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
